description: Numbers n such that string 8,5 occurs in the base 9 representation of n but not of n+1.
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,9],{8,5}]>0,1,0],{n,3500}],{0,1}]][[2]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 24 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 24 2015
